GET /api.description: responds with a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: responds with an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: responds with an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: responds with a review object for the given review_id

review.title: Culture a Love of Agriculture With Agricola
review.review_body: You could sum up Agricola with the simple phrase 'Farmyeard Fun' but the mechanics and game play add so much more than that. You'll find yourself torn between breeding pigs, or sowing crops. Its joyeous and rewarding and it makes you think of time spent outside, which is much harder to do these days!

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: the request body accepts an object in the form {inc_votes: newVote } where newVote is a number indicating how much the votes property should be updated by and responds with the updated review object

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: responds with an array of comments for the given review_id

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: the request body accepts an object in the form {username: name, comment_body: body } and responds with the posted comment object. The user must already have a username set up.

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment for the given comment_id. Responds with a status 204 and no content,
